clues.text: 20th C. theologian Romano Guardini was born in Verona but studied at the Univ. of Tubingen in this country

rounds.comments: (Alex: Words that are the same coming and going.)

rounds.text: "The Everything Store" is a book about this company that in 2012 was home to 1% of all North American Internet traffic
